metadata.title: CVE-2017-0645 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in Bluetooth could enable a localmalicious application to access data outside of its permission levels. Thisissue is rated as Moderate because it is a local bypass of user interactionrequirements. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. AndroidID: A-35385327.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
